title: Truth Be Told
description: Love is a thin red line. When it's crossed, there's no going back. Stella knows the three most important rules of exotic dancing:1. Don't get involved with the men.2. Don't get involved with the men.3. Don't get involved with the men.Even if they are sexy, rich, and devastatingly handsome. Even if they save your life.Truth Be Told is a full-length standalone romance with no cheating or cliffhangers. Disclaimer: This book contains dark elements including scenes of non-sexual assault and trauma.
author: Holly Ryan
